revised_title: The Capacity for Heat of Metals at Different Temperatures: An Account of Experiments Performed in the Research Laboratory of the University College of South Wales and Monmouthshire
tldr: This study investigates the capacity for heat of various metals at different temperatures using an innovative experimental method that minimizes sources of error. The research focuses on aluminum, iron, copper, zinc, silver, cadmium, tin, and lead, providing accurate and reliable data for further analysis and comparison.
